text:
Hi everyone,
I was watching NLP video of JuliaCon2018, in which the speaker used matchall function, but I didn't find function in Cascadia package. Is matchall function of Cascadia is replaced by eachmatch function?

elements.text:
Hi everyone,
I was watching NLP video of JuliaCon2018, in which the speaker used matchall function, but I didn't find function in Cascadia package. Is matchall function of Cascadia is replaced by eachmatch function?

text: Yes. Probably to match base APIs.

elements.text: Yes. Probably to match base APIs.
